DataElement.preferredName: Charlson Comorbidity Index Chart Review Version Has Any Rheumatic or Connective Tissue Disease Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether or not an individual have rheumatologic disease including systemic lupus erythematous, polymyositis, mixed connective tissue disease, rheumatoid arthritis, polymyalgia rheumatica, vasculitis, sarcoidosis, Sjogrens syndrome or any other systemicvasculitis, determined by reviewing information from the medical record.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Charlson Comorbidity Index Chart Review Version Has Any Rheumatic or Connective Tissue Disease
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A method of predicting mortality by weighting comorbid conditions calculated by reviewing an individual's chart._A question about whether an individual has or had any rheumatic or connective tissue disease.

Property.preferredName: Has any Rheumatic or Connective Tissue Disease
